text: Gladys Amelia Anslow (1892-1962) was a physicist who worked at Smith College. Anslow got her undergraduate degree and Master's from Smith College. She then got a Doctor of Philosophy from Yale University in 1924. She got the President's Certificate of Merit for service during World War II. == References == Category:1892 births Category:1962 deaths Category:American physicists Category:Scientists from Massachusetts Category:Yale University alumni
title: Gladys Anslow
